title: Authorizes approval of certain transportation contracts of the Port Chester-Rye union free school district
summary: Authorizes approval of certain transportation contracts of the Port Chester-Rye union free school district for the 2007-2008 school year.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                          777

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by M. of A. LATIMER -- read once and referred to the Commit-
         tee on Education

       AN ACT to authorize approval of certain transportation contracts of  the
         Port Chester-Rye union free school district

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. All the acts done and proceedings heretofore had and  taken
    2  or  caused to be had and taken by the Port Chester-Rye union free school
    3  district and by  all  officers,  employees  or  agents  of  such  school
    4  district  relating  to  or  in  connection with transportation contracts
    5  C-260277 and C-260278 of the 2007-2008 school year, and all  acts  inci-
    6  dental  thereto are hereby legalized, validated, ratified and confirmed,
    7  notwithstanding any failure to comply with the contract award, approval,
    8  and filing provisions of the education law, the general municipal law or
    9  any other law or any other statutory  authority,  rule  or  regulations,
   10  other than those filing provisions defined in paragraph a of subdivision
   11  5  of  section  3604  of the education law, in relation to any omission,
   12  error, defect, irregularity or illegality in  such  proceeding  had  and
   13  taken.
   14    S  2.  The  education  department  is  hereby directed to consider the
   15  aforementioned contracts for transportation  aid  as  valid  and  proper
   16  obligations of the Port Chester-Rye union free school district.
   17    S 3. This act shall take effect immediately.



        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD00309-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to authorize approval of certain transportation contracts of the Port Chester-Rye union free school district
